DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effect of PDT and TTT for the treatment of subfoveal occult CNV in age-related macular degeneration.
DOC.brief_title: Photodynamic Therapy (PDT) Versus Transpupillary Thermotherapy (TTT) in Occult Choroidal Neovascularization (CNV) in Age-related Macular Degeneration (AMD)
DOC.criteria: > 55 years of age, Subfoveal occult only CNV due to AMD, < 4 disc areas or > 4 disc areas VA < 0.4 Sign of classic CNV, CNV in other diagnoses than AMD,
